name: Sisters of Mercy Doom v1.0
description: I really like the Sisters and when I found that there were no Doom WADs for them I set out to make my own! And here it is!!! I searched the Net for MIDI files, so far I've only found 4, if you have any that I could add then please e-mail them to me!!! The tracks included are: * Temple of Love 1992 * Alice * A Rock in a Hard Place * --One which I don't have yet and so I don't know it's name :-(
